meanings.definition: The act of making something political.
meanings.sent1: Her constant politicalizations of everyday topics made conversations uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The politicalizations of the school board meetings led to heated debates.
meanings.sent3: During the family dinner, his politicalizations of the menu choices caused laughter among the guests.
meanings.sent4: The politicalizations of the workplace turned colleagues into rivals fighting for power.
meanings.sent5: The constant politicalizations in the office made it feel like a never-ending election campaign.

meanings.definition: The process of bringing a political perspective to a situation.
meanings.sent1: The politicalizations of the charity event brought attention to important social issues.
meanings.sent2: Her politicalizations of the environmental crisis highlighted the need for immediate action.
meanings.sent3: His politicalizations of the office potluck made everyone view food choices as political statements.
meanings.sent4: The politicalizations of the school play turned a simple performance into a debate on societal values.
meanings.sent5: The intense politicalizations of the community picnic made it feel like a campaign rally.
